com.simsilica.es.server

Class SessionDataDelegator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simsilica.es.net.AbstractMessageDelegator<com.jme3.network.HostedConnection>
      • com.simsilica.es.server.SessionDataDelegator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.network.MessageListener<com.jme3.network.HostedConnection>

    public class SessionDataDelegator
extends AbstractMessageDelegator<com.jme3.network.HostedConnection>
    A MessageListener implementation that will forward messages to methods of a delegate specified as a HostedConnection session attribute. This is useful for handling connection-specific messages from clients that must delegate to client-specific data objects. The delegate methods can be automapped or specifically specified.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a MessageListener that will forward mapped message types to methods of an object specified as a HostedConnection attribute.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SessionDataDelegator

        public SessionDataDelegator(java.lang.Class delegateType,
                            java.lang.String attributeName,
                            boolean automap)
        Creates a MessageListener that will forward mapped message types to methods of an object specified as a HostedConnection attribute. If automap is true then all methods with the proper signature will be mapped.

        Methods of the following signatures are allowed:

        • void someName(S conn, SomeMessage msg)
        • void someName(Message msg)
        Where S is the type of MessageConnection and SomeMessage is some specific concreate Message subclass.
